long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension will be used to optimize working time, system developers will be able to quickly access the invisible fields of the application. 
The user will install the extension to obtain the best performance in the activity they will perform.

ScriptCase Edit Field Enabler was created to add an edit icon to invisible fields on the Scriptcase 'Edit Fields' page.
